snapshot:
DarkNet Daemon Discovery Puzzle

Clues

Our benevolent technological leader - daemon

The Answer to the Ultimate Question of Life, the Universe, and Everything - 42

Critical flavoring agent in beer - hops

Greek letter commonly used for micro - mu

Hex value of an ASCII comma - 2c

Ways to vary difficulty

  • Easy: "You're trying to build a 16 character onion address"
  • Medium: "You're trying to build a 16 character string that will take you somewhere hidden"
  • Hard: "Solve some puzzles to reveal a hidden location"
  • Easy: "Assemble the pieces in this order"
  • Medium: "Figure out the right order" (pretty easy to brute force if you know it is an onion address and have all the pieces correct)
  • Easy: "Here are (brute-force-possible) hashes of each individual answer"
  • Medium: "Here are brute-force-resistent hashes of each individual answer"
  • Hard: "Good luck! No hints or piecewise confirmation"
